channel.title: Posts on Jung-Jin Lee's website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jung-Jin Lee's website

item.title: PCA and MDS
item.description: A mock data set consisting of 100 data points, say \(\mathbf{P}_1, \cdots, \mathbf{P}_{100}\) in \(\mathbb{R}^3\): set.seed(2018) n <- 100 Xraw <- data.frame(x = rnorm(n, mean = 3, sd = 1), y = rnorm(n, mean = 2, sd = 2), z = rnorm(n, mean = -1, sd = 1)) dim(Xraw) ## [1] 100 3 library(plotly) colored <- c("P1", "P2", "P3", rep("P4 - P100", n-3)) plot_ly(Xraw, x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z, color = colored, colors = c("red", "blue", "green", "grey")) %>% add_markers() {"
